Core idea:
Interest rates decide kitna mehenga loan ya EMI hoga. Jab rates badhte hain, borrowing mehenga ho jata hai, isliye consumers aur businesses kam kharch aur investment karte hain. Central banks rates badhate ya ghatate hain taaki inflation control ho aur economy zyada steady rahe. Rate hike growth ko slow karta hai, rate cut growth ko boost kar sakta hai lekin inflation badh sakti hai.

Analogy (if helpful):
Socho interest rate ek tap jaisa hai jo paise ka flow control karta hai. Tap tight karoge (rate badhao), paise ka flow kam hoga aur spending rukegi; tap khologe (rate ghatayo), paise zyada flow karenge aur log zyada kharche karenge.

Core idea: Interest rates ante banks and lenders charge chesey cost for a loan. Rate perigi ante loans costly avuthayi, so people spending thaggistaru, companies investment cut chestaru, economy slow avvachu. Rate thaggite opposite, borrowing cheap avutundi, spending and growth peragachu. Central bank interest rates penchadam leda thaggadam valla, inflation ni control cheyadam and economy ni steady ga undadaniki try chestaru.

Analogy (simple): Ikkada central bank ni water tap laga anukondi. Tap ekkuvaga open cheste water fast ga flow avutundi, tank full ayye speed peruguthundi (economy hot, inflation peragachu). Tap thaggite flow slow avutundi, tank slow ga fill avutundi (economy cool avuthundi, inflation thagguthundi).

Core idea:

Central banks interest rates ko badha ya ghata ke inflation ko control karte hain aur economic growth ko stable rakhne ki koshish karte hain. Analogy (simple):
Socho central bank economy ka thermostat hai. Jab ghar bahut garam ho (inflation high), thermostat thanda karta hai — matlab interest rates badhate hain, paise ka flow kam hota, ghar thanda hota. Interest rates economy lo chala important.  
Interest rates peragite, loan theesukovadam costly avthundi, EMI ekkuva avutayi.  
Daani valla people and businesses spending, investment cut chestaru, economy slow avvachu.  
Central banks interest rates ni tool laga use chestaru, inflation control cheyadaniki and growth ni stable ga maintain cheyadaniki.

Interest rates ni car speed regulator laga chudandi.  
Inflation fast unte, central bank brake pedthundi by raising interest rates.  
Brake vadinappudu car slow avtundi, same way spending and investment slow avutayi.
